changeSet.author: nfleming
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`extraction_info` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `spinGroupName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `starttime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `proteinasek` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, `pkdb` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, `bindingbuffer` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, `washbuffer1` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, `washbuffer2` varchar(125) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY (`spinGroupName`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: nfleming
changeSet.comment: Create join table for Natera extractions info and Sample
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`sample_extraction_info` ( `sample_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `extraction_info_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sample_id`, `extraction_info_id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_EXT_SAMPLE_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`sample_id`) REFERENCES `sample` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_EXT_INFO_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`extraction_info_id`) REFERENCES `extraction_info` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
